parameters: \pop[6]I let out a soft sigh, and everything suddenly feels better.
\pop[6]It's crazy how much a quick mental breather can help.
\pop[6]My last counselor is the one who taught me that.
\pop[6]He told me that our mind is like an office full of filing cabinets.
\pop[6]If we don't gather our thoughts, they just lay around, piling up.
\pop[6]We need to set some time aside to process and filter them.
\pop[6]Sometimes a simple metaphor like that can really change the way you think.
\pop[6]Unwanted thoughts can be thrown away like trash, while you organize the rest.
\pop[6]If our mind was a physical space, we'd never neglect it. We'd keep it immaculate.
\pop[6]As if it was perfectly timed, the report ends alongside that train of thought.
\pop[6]The energy level in the room immediately skyrockets now that we're "free".
\pop[6]Honestly, it was a waste. That was an hour we'll never get back.
\pop[6]As I get up to leave for my appointment, I notice something peculiar.
\pop[6]The report goes right into some sort of "after-show", about more \c[23]Argus\c[0] stuff.
\pop[6]I don't really care to watch, but I notice the word "\c[23]Nostalgia\c[0]".
\pop[6]It's littered all over the place, like they \c[14]want\c[0] me to keep it in my mind.
\pop[6]Unfortunately for them, I'm not in a nostalgic mood right now.
\pop[6]I leave the house, looking toward my ever-brighter future.
\pop[6]After all, why look \c[14]back\c[0] when the alternative is so exciting?
\pop[6]Nothing has ever been the same since then, and I don't think it ever will be.
\pop[6]The current state of technology and society is vastly different than it would've been.
\pop[6]At the top of it all, right next to the world leaders, is the \c[23]Argus Corporation\c[0].
\pop[6]They created \c[23]The System\c[0]. They create almost every device we use today.
\pop[6]In many ways, they affect our lives even more than those in power.
\pop[6]The report is basically going over the history of \c[17]Komorebi\c[0] and \c[23]Argus\c[0].
\pop[6]But to be honest, it seems a little self-serving, and very unnecessary.
\pop[6]Isaac was right. It's like they just want to stroke their own egos.
\pop[6]If you ignore the special report, you'd lose some points.
\pop[6]Essentially, our social status is being held for ransom.
\pop[6]But if there's one thing that nobody can monitor, it's what I'm thinking of.
\pop[6]So while I'm "watching", at least I have time to gather my thoughts.

\pop[6]One day, the world was changed forever.
\pop[6]Billions of people experienced vivid visions of the future.
\pop[6]These could not be mistaken for dreams. It seemed to be true precognition.
\pop[6]The visions that people had, would follow them for the rest of their lives.
\pop[6]Replaying at the worst possible times, it was almost like an intrusive thought.
\pop[6]Whether positive or negative in nature, these visions still consumed lives.
\pop[6]Nobody knew how or why this happened, but it was far too late. Chaos ensued.
\pop[6]Those who saw personal success went to great lengths to fulfill their visions.
\pop[6]Those who saw personal failures did anything they could to avoid them.
\pop[6]It wasn't just a one time event, either. \c[17]Komorebi\c[0] overstayed its welcome.
\pop[6]Children and grandchildren grew up alongside this odd phenomenon.
\pop[6]They too, experienced their own visions around the age of thirteen.
\pop[6]The world became obsessed with the future. Obsessed with \c[17]Komorebi\c[0].
\pop[6]It was a word describing sunlight that shines down through the trees.
\pop[6]A simple and poetic metaphor for the visions filtering into our world.
\pop[6]However, it wasn't a series of visions. Nor would they change over time.
\pop[6]It was a vision of a single moment, and it would follow you for the rest of your life.
\pop[6]For example, if your vision was horrible. You'd still be forced to live it almost every day.
\pop[6]It seemed far from fair, and lives were defined by the moment presented in people's visions.
\pop[6]Nothing has ever been the same since then, and I don't think it ever will be.
\pop[6]The current state of technology and society is vastly different than it would've been.
\pop[6]At the top of it all, right next to the world leaders, is the \c[23]Argus Corporation\c[0].
\pop[6]They created \c[23]The System\c[0]. They create almost every device we use today.
\pop[6]In many ways, they affect our lives even more than those in power.
\pop[6]The report is basically going over the history of \c[17]Komorebi\c[0] and \c[23]Argus\c[0].
